description: Use frozen stir-fry vegetables to make this speedy dinner option. It's packed with ginger, beef, almonds and fresh greens for a tasty bowl of yum.
name: Easy Almond & Beef Noodle Stir-Fry Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 400g beef oyster steak, fat trimmed, thinly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare noodles according to packet instructions. Set aside.

Meanwhile, heat 1 tbs vegetable oil in a wok or large frying pan over high heat. Stir-fry beef, in two batches, for 2 minutes or until browned. Add ginger and stir-fry for a further 30 seconds or until fragrant. Set aside.

In the same wok, heat remaining vegetable oil over high heat. Stir-fry vegetables for 4 minutes or until soft. Add sauce, noodles and 1/2 cup water and stir-fry for 2-3 minutes or until heated through.
Add beef and almonds and stir-fry for 1 minute or until heated through. Serve topped with coriander and spring onion.
